outputs.output_descr:
1. National institutions have capacity to improve knowledge base to facilitate climate change adaptation.
2. Pilot sites for livelihood strategies selected for improved and sustained coping with drought.
3. M&E, learning, and adaptive feedback.

project_descr: Demonstrate and promote adoption of a range of gender sensitive approaches for adaptation to climate change among rural communities currently engaged in agriculture in vulnerable areas as a national model for climate change adaptation.
project_title: Zimbabwe: Coping with Drought & Climate Change
